data.title: Logiframe's Social Responsibility Endeavors: A Partnership with Peduli Anak Foundation
data.meta_description: Logiframe stands at the forefront, demonstrating a commitment to social impact that transcends conventional business boundaries.
data.text:
In an era where corporate responsibility plays an increasingly vital role in shaping positive societal change, Logiframe stands at the forefront, demonstrating a commitment to social impact that transcends conventional business boundaries. Recognizing the profound impact businesses can have on their communities, Logiframe has strategically aligned its resources to empower individuals within the firm, facilitating a meaningful difference in the realms of children's welfare and education.

At the heart of Logiframe's social responsibility initiatives is a profound partnership with the Peduli Anak Foundation, a non-profit organization dedicated to the welfare of underprivileged children in Lombok and Sumbawa, Indonesia. Logiframe's commitment goes beyond traditional philanthropy, as the company leverages its professional expertise to provide pro bono services aimed at bolstering the operational efficiency and effectiveness of the foundation.

The Peduli Anak Foundation, founded in 2005 by Chaim Fetter during his travels through rural Indonesia, emerged from a deep-seated desire to address the harsh living conditions and lack of opportunities faced by street children. By purchasing 1.5 hectares of land on the remote island of Lombok, the foundation embarked on a journey to build shelters, schools, and medical facilities from scratch.

Today, the Peduli Anak Foundation stands as a beacon of hope for thousands of underprivileged, neglected, and abused children. Operating in Lombok and Sumbawa, the organization provides family-like care, education, in-home family support, medical assistance, and legal advocacy for children under its care. The mission of the Peduli Anak Foundation revolves around fighting for the rights of underprivileged children by offering shelter, education, medical support, advocacy, and family care. The vision is simple yet powerful: "Every child in the world deserves a chance to live a happy and healthy life, free from poverty, exploitation, and violence.

The Peduli Anak Foundation is actively engaged in several programs aimed at fulfilling its mission:

Medical Emergencies

The foundation addresses the urgent healthcare needs of impoverished children in rural and remote communities on Lombok Island. This includes facilitating emergency medical response, organizing fundraising campaigns, and coordinating care in major cities.

Child Advocacy/Legal Aid

Peduli Anak supports Child Protection Services and Social Services in aiding children who have experienced abuse and neglect. The organization provides a safe, child-friendly environment, counseling, medical evaluations, and ongoing support for victims.

Education

Peduli Anak has established both an elementary and middle school, ensuring control over the quality of education provided. This initiative aims to prevent school dropouts during the critical adolescent stage, when children are susceptible to various influences.

Extracurricular Activities

Offering a holistic approach to child development, Peduli Anak provides extracurricular activities ranging from sports and arts to foreign languages. These activities empower children to explore their talents and interests beyond the academic realm.

In alignment with the UN Millennium Goals and the UN Convention on the Rights of the Child, Peduli Anak Foundation's multifaceted approach to child welfare has found a steadfast ally in Logiframe. Through Logiframe's pro bono services, a synergy is created, amplifying the positive impact on the lives of underprivileged children and contributing to the realization of a brighter, more equitable future.
